snippet: A failure in Amazon’s cloud computing service might prompt some companies to re-examine their dependence on such services.
abstract: Lightning in Virginia disables part of Amazon's popular cloud computing service, disrupting access to several well-known Web sites including Netflix and Instagram; interruption underlines how businesses and consumers are increasingly exposed to unforeseen risks as they come to rely on cloud services.
lead_paragraph: A failure in Amazon’s cloud computing service might prompt some companies to re-examine their dependence on such services.

headline.seo: Amazon’s Cloud Is Disrupted by a Summer Storm
headline.main: A Summer Storm’s Disruption Is Felt in the Technology Cloud
headline.print_headline: A Summer Storm’s Disruption Is Felt in the Technology Cloud
